description: This file defines the EmrCluster class, a resource representation for managing AWS EMR clusters, including methods for creating, reading, and deleting clusters, with detailed configuration options and AWS SDK interactions.

classes.name: EmrCluster
classes.description: Represents an AWS EMR cluster resource with methods to create, read, and delete clusters, including configuration management and AWS SDK interactions.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates an EMR cluster using AWS SDK with specified configurations.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the EMR cluster to reach the 'running' state after creation.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the current state of the EMR cluster from AWS and updates internal attributes.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the EMR cluster via AWS SDK.
